attributes.action: Allow university students to have a safety net across all universities.
attributes.background: To ensure that every university student in the UK has a safety net in place to ensure that students do not struggle both academically and mentally while trying to pass a year in university. Education has been different this year and it is unfair to expect the same standard of assignments, exams, etc

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563936
